The Layer Lab is growing!

Prospective grad students, please checkout either the IQ Biology PhD program that the BioFrontiers Institute runs and/or the CU CS PhD program.

Current undergrads, please email ryan at layer lab dot org about research opportunities.

Current grad students, please email ryan at layer lab dot org about rotations.

Prospective post docs, please see CU Careers#12752 for complete description.
